TopicTitle: Rate the signature of the user above you

Articles.Content: 4/10 Animated thing that doesn't run backwards anymore...
a question that makes you think about the life universe and everything... nah not really 6/10 for having the idea to not have the idea of a signature.
Not too flashy signature with a Steam and a couple nice quotes. 9/10
8/10 What the ...?

She's not running anymore. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

8/10
9/10 for subtlety. Is that a word?

6/10 For self advertisement, plus two for the high-res picture of a kerbal, giving you a solid - 

\*Drum roll\*

8/10
8/10, lots for the King Santa, but you lost some because I don't believe that you are in my neighborhood, or wearing a spider suit.

6/10

Just a little advertisement.
8/10 for almost invisibile pwny.

7/10 for looking like a starfish. (That's an in-joke, by the way... you may laugh now.)

(I SAID, LAUGH.)

**Edited <time datetime="2012-08-18T13:24:43Z" title="08/18/2012 01:24  PM" data-short="11 yr">August 18, 2012</time> by flaillomanz**
9/10 for dat scientist
3/10 It was kinda funny, but thats not much.
10/10 since you been to more planets and moons than me.

6/10, negative for th--- SSSSHHHH

People are sensitive about me criticizing things I don't like.

Especially M--- SHUT UP \*Punches Self in face\*
10/10 best meme
10/10 you gone farther out than me.
3/10 random symbols and for feeling sorry for the bronies
3/10 you got text.
6/10. Odd formatting choices...
7/10 I do love explsions ,and things catching on fire.(Like placing a firework under a huge lego house then watch it blow into bits)
5/10, only get the first line...
8/10 because it provides some great links
10/10 where have you not been?
